WRITING.TEXT:
I would advise you to mail the watch to me. I will enjoy it to the fullest, thereby warranting the purchase price you paid for the item.
PM me for shipping details.

The best way to show someone how much your butt hurts is to tell someone that they shouldn't knock your shitty opinion.
Shitty. Opinion.
Especially the monkey in the middle.

Jimmie switched the tape before he "destroyed" it.
Chuck's copy is a simple soundbite of Jimmy's confession.
Jimmy's original copy extends beyond and includes the post confession discussion about Jimmy's reasoning for saying what he did.
This, in addition to Mike's photos and testimony from the ER doc about Chucks delusional behaviour, as well as testimony about the Mesa Verde fuckup will all lead to dismissal on allegations for Jimmy and unrecoverable disgrace for Chuck.
Jimmy will pause in his victory to consider the brother he just vanquished and weigh remorse against the thrill of eating Chuck alive, and at this time decide to leave Jimmy behind with Chuck, and adopt a more marketable identity in his place.

Besides me? Yes.
Nobody else though.

Why did the Predalien have a cute little upturned tushie?
Ass like Howard the Duck...
Precisely!

I'm hoping this spin-off takes the hugs to another level.
Maybe the Mayans can all grind and twerk when shit gets emotional. Lots of below the waist, bro-on-bro contact shots to establish closeness...
I'm imagining Commander Adama boofing Tuco Salamanca right now. It's amazing. Try it.

Where's it at?
80's kid. Pizza fanatic.
This is a must-take selfie.
My Facebook profile demands it!

Me too. For a cheapo, it's hard to beat.
I kinda dig those wierd buttons. In reach, and relatively out of the way.
And the clamp works way better than I figured it might. Real snug, and so far, not scratchy.
OP should totally trade me...

Boooooooooo!
Yeah, I got the same email. Biw, to wait for that sweet, sweet credit.
Yes. Trade me for my Beboncool Bluetooth gamepad.

Sennheiser... still as ugly as they were back when you listened to science class film strips in elementary school, still sound better than most of the prettier, more modern trash out there.
And still second best to Grado.
Good Brand, though. Thanks for this write up. I've been considering a nice over-ear set for my new headset. Using you Sennheisers to measure your AKGs was great!
I think you just talked me into a set of Grado SR-22's.
I jumped in too. Last time I got screwed, eBay tossed me a credit double the purchase price. Got a sweet Pebble watch with that. What's the worst that can happen here?

David tries to "fix" her, repaying the sweet, sweet head she gave him alone in deep space.
He's not evil, just... simple.
Is she feeding the big fella, or is she "holding his hair back" for him?
Service after 7 would be great start. There are more people than just the nine-to-fivers who ride.

Yes.
I ended up in a screening at the Orpheum around the corner from my apartment, thinking it was the Shyamalan flick, and sat through the thing scratching my head at its severe lack of McAvoy until the bean mashing scene hit the screen. This caused the second walk-out in my life.
Guess, I'll check out this one next, as I've yet to see the well-known Split.
Awesome. Liked, following.

Cool. I thought they blended a bit too well to be anything but, but (butt butt!) I've only ever seen those bands in promo photos.
That band really makes the gold one look good. Stainless always looks good, but that ugly gold really needed something nice to look other than... Tacky? That band is it. Should have been standard issue.
Wanna sell the Stainless one?
What band is on those Time Steels?
Wait... Did this movie feature a Haggard old lady masturbating furiously (and graphically) during a performance exhibition?
It say SMARTWATCH on the face

I'm 42.50 in so far, and I've got an OG Pebble, and a Time. Both refurbed and minty. I think it's doable. One month, perhaps two and I'll will hopefully be on my way to seeking out even cheaper repaints. Treat these things like I used to treat Swatches back in '92.

PTS, 50 new, 35 refurbished
PS, 35 new, 25 refurbished
PTR, 75 new, 50 refurbished
P2, 50 new, 25 refurbished
Prices based on the best I've seen among Amazon, eBay, and Woot.
I found a seller with 8 red P2s for 20 bucks new on Amazon and didn't grab one because I thought it was fishy, told a buddy who snagged one before they were all gone. Haven't seen anything close since.
Ideally, I'd like a complete set for under 200 total.

Wait... There's no Sbarro at the malls here?
It's been a while since my loitering days, and I don't think I've eaten in Town East, or West's food courts in a decade...
I was living in Salina when their Sbarro became a Sbarro-type place.
Did that happen here, too?

A feature I would not pass up.
You know how those guys do at closing time?
10 bucks, take it all. I used to walk out with four or five pizza boxes filled with leftovers for my roommates when I worked at a mall GameStop.
If that were down the hall, I would rarely shop for groceries.
That's the day I become an arsonist.

Technically canon.
Adding to my collection, framing and displaying.
Thanks, OP!

Too old, but I would have been guilty as heck.
How exactly are you giving yourself a sly edge?

Sweet.
How's this work? 10 bucks a day, with a hold on my credit card?

I'll have one OG Pebble, one Time, one Steel, one Time Round, one Time Round Steel, and one Pebble 2.
All red.
